SELECT ( CASE WHEN ROUTE_NAME = "磨机线路（电）" THEN "电仪" ELSE "磨浮" END ) section, uploadResultTime AS time, devName AS equip, SC_PART AS part, SC_CONTENT AS spot, ID as id, RESULT AS value, ( CASE WHEN ALTPID = 1 THEN "二级" WHEN ALTPID = 2 THEN "一级" END ) level, std_value AS standard FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' AND ZONE_NAME='FX150-GT脱泥旋流器')
AND (ALTPID = 1 OR ALTPID = 2) AND date(TASKSTART_TM) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) ORDER BY uploadResultTime DESC;

SELECT (case when DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' THEN '生产' WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' END )section, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'Y' OR NULL) AS checked, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'W' OR NULL) AS unchecked, count(ALTPID = 1 OR NULL) AS alarm, count(ALTPID = 2 OR NULL) AS danger FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE (ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' OR ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线') AND ( devName = '脱泥旋流器' )
AND -- YEARWEEK(date_format(TASKSTART_TM, '%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1) -- 一周数据（测试用） to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now()) -- 当天数据 -- TASKSTART_TM>'2019-07-10' GROUP BY section

select '设备' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART='内衬' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART like '进料分配器%' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART = '各紧固螺栓' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN ( SC_PART like '进料管%' ) THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='其它' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5'
FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1 THEN '故障' WHEN ALTPID = 0 THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选系统' AND devName = "脱泥旋流器" -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-08-19' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp

select '生产' as 'devName', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='旋流器' AND SC_CONTENT='是否破损漏浆' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a1', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='旋流器' AND SC_CONTENT='沉砂溢流是否堵塞' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a2', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='进浆阀' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a3', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='槽体' AND SC_CONTENT='是否堵塞' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a4', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='槽体' AND SC_CONTENT='是否漏浆' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a5', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='管路' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a6', MAX(CASE WHEN SC_PART='其它' THEN tempResult end ) as 'a7' FROM ( SELECT SC_PART,devName,SC_CONTENT,RESULT, (CASE WHEN RESULT='停机不检' THEN RESULT WHEN RESULT='手工已检' THEN REMARK WHEN ( (ALTPID = 2 OR ALTPID=1) ) THEN '故障' WHEN ( ALTPID = 0) THEN '正常' ELSE RESULT END ) as tempResult FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线' AND devName = "脱泥旋流器" -- AND TASKSTART_TM='2019-08-19' AND to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now())-- 当天数据 )as temp
